content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case without disclosing the names of the parties involved the case was heard at the tartu county court and a decision was made on 15-06-2017 the party involved in the case is responsible for covering the procedural costs except for the state fee of 400 eur the duration of the case was 1 year and 3 months the final resolution was made by the tartu county court but the details are not specified the text refers to specific articles of the legal code indicated by the symbol the case involved a joint property dispute between gj and rj the court ordered the termination of a jointlyowned condominium and for rj to compensate gj for the rent of an apartment and movable property the court also ordered the distribution of procedural costs and for gj to pay a state fee both parties have the right to appeal the decision within 30 days the defendant also filed a counterclaim requesting a fair division of the joint assets the text further discusses the division of the joint property compensation amounts and alternative methods of dividing the property the parties have reached a compromise where one party will retain the condominium and compensate the other party the text also mentions the valuation of a summer cottage and its movable property the court determined that the defendant should pay the claimant a certain amount in compensation the text concludes by stating that both parties will bear their own costs and the claimant has been ordered to pay the state fee in monthly installments
